mapper.insert: insert into project_info (id, name, git_address, describe, status, operator, ios_developer, android_developer, last_pull_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iosDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androidDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastPullTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update project_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, git_address = #{gitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ios_developer = #{iosDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, android_developer = #{androidDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_pull_time = #{lastPullTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, git_address, describe, status, operator, ios_developer, android_developer, last_pull_time, create_time, update_time from project_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
